pages.text: When wearing $(6)Energy Collectors$() armor or having an Energy Shield Generator equipped in the accessory slot, you will have an Energy Shield. $(br2)The Energy Shield relies on energy from its carrier to provide complete protection against damage.

When you wear a full set of $(6)Energy Collectors$() armor, and each $(6)Energy Collector$() has more than $(4)10.00M EMC$() of energy, you can activate the $(c)Last Stand$() mode. $(br2)In Last Stand mode, when you die, it will consume the $(6)Energy Collectors$() and $(br)$(4)10.00M EMC$(0) to prevent death. $(br2)At the same time, it will restore your full health and about 1/5 of your Energy Shield charge.
